name: Seokbul-sa
excerpt: Hard to find, difficult to reach and a wonder to behold, this hermitage has Buddhist images meticulously etched into stone. Visually powerful in scale and…

excerpt: Anyone with a love of seafood and a tolerance for powerful odours could easily spend an hour exploring the country’s largest fish market. Narrow lanes…

name: Beomeo-sa
excerpt: This magnificent temple is Busan’s best sight. Despite its city location, Beomeo-sa is a world away from the urban jungle, with beautiful architecture set…

name: East Gate
excerpt: A restored gate on Geumjeong-san.

name: South Gate
excerpt: This gate is close to the cable car.

name: North Gate
excerpt: It's a steady climb up to the North Gate from Beomeo-sa.

name: West Gate
excerpt: An attractive gate on Geumjeong-san, but less visited because it's off the ridge trail.

name: Geumgang Park
excerpt: This park features a cable car, located about 150m from the park entrance; follow the Ropeway signs.

name: Nurimaru APEC House
excerpt: Located on Dongbaekseom Island, the grounds of this contemporary memorial and conference hall offers great sea views and are a nice place for a stroll.

name: Millennium Statue
excerpt: During the Christmas season, the streets are aglow and the area around the statute might be the most beautiful place in the city for an evening stroll.

name: Busan Tower
